items.title: Vertical interconnect elevator based on through silicon vias
items.abstract: Another aspect of the disclosure provides a Vertical Interconnect Elevator (VIE) chip based on Trough-Silicon-Vias (TSVs) in a silicon substrate or Trough-Glass-Vias (TGVs) in a glass substrate. The VIE chip is for use in the FPGA/HBM or logic/HBM stacked 3D CSP as disclosed and specified above.

first_item.title: Vertical interconnect elevator based on through silicon vias
first_item.abstract: Another aspect of the disclosure provides a Vertical Interconnect Elevator (VIE) chip based on Trough-Silicon-Vias (TSVs) in a silicon substrate or Trough-Glass-Vias (TGVs) in a glass substrate. The VIE chip is for use in the FPGA/HBM or logic/HBM stacked 3D CSP as disclosed and specified above.
